The front grille of the red sports car in the image is black with a textured, mesh-like pattern. It is positioned centrally at the front of the vehicle, spanning horizontally across the width of the car's front end. The grille is relatively large compared to the overall size of the car, emphasizing its importance as an aerodynamic and aesthetic feature.

The emblem, located in the center of the grille, is silver and circular with a stylized design. It appears to be a logo, possibly representing the manufacturer of the car. The emblem is small in comparison to the grille itself but stands out due to its metallic sheen and distinct shape against the dark background of the grille. The emblem's design includes intricate details that make it visually distinctive, setting it apart from simpler emblems found on other vehicles.
